comment:
Дверь Амасекуса взрывается, входят Чорда с охраной
Чорда

languages.text: "Банда еретика Владайма Токара! Сложите оружие и предстаньте перед праведным судом!"
"Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"
languages.original_text: "Банда еретика Владайма Токара! Сложите оружие и предстаньте перед праведным судом!"

traits.locale_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"
"Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"
"Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"
"Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"
"Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"
"Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

languages.text: “是异端分子弗拉迪姆·托卡拉的帮派成员！放下武器，接受正义的审判吧！”
languages.original_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

traits.locale_text: “是异端分子弗拉迪姆·托卡拉的帮派成员！放下武器，接受正义的审判吧！”

languages.text: 「異端者ヴラダイム・トカラ一味諸君！今こそ武器を捨て、正義の裁きを受けるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者ヴラダイム・トカラ一味諸君！今こそ武器を捨て、正義の裁きを受けるのだ！」

languages.text: «¡Miembros de la banda del hereje Vladaym Tocara! ¡Bajad las armas y enfrentaos a la justicia!».
languages.original_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Miembros de la banda del hereje Vladaym Tocara! ¡Bajad las armas y enfrentaos a la justicia!».

languages.text: "Mitglieder der Bande des Ketzers Vladaym Tocara! Legt Eure Waffen nieder und stellt Euch der rechtschaffenen Gerechtigkeit!"
languages.original_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

traits.locale_text: "Mitglieder der Bande des Ketzers Vladaym Tocara! Legt Eure Waffen nieder und stellt Euch der rechtschaffenen Gerechtigkeit!"

languages.text: « Membres du gang de l'hérétique Vladaym Tocara ! Déposez vos armes et préparez-vous à être jugés ! »
languages.original_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

traits.locale_text: « Membres du gang de l'hérétique Vladaym Tocara ! Déposez vos armes et préparez-vous à être jugés ! »

languages.text: "Kâfir Vladaym Tocara'nın çetesinin mensupları! Silahlarınızı bırakın ve adaletle yüzleşin!"
languages.original_text: "Members of the heretic Vladaym Tocara's gang! Lay down your arms and face righteous justice!"

traits.locale_text: "Kâfir Vladaym Tocara'nın çetesinin üyeleri! Silahlarınızı bırakın ve adaletle yüzleşin!"
